https://tmrev.io/movie/1024526-100 Years of Ulysses 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xhETTStFI0xtuqqewXpOsMEfVU6.jpg Paris, France, February 2, 1922. The novel Ulysses, by Irish writer James Joyce (1882-1941), is published by US poet Sylvia Beach (1887-1962), owner of the small bookstore Shakespeare & Co. The book, whose writing consumed seven years of Joyce's life, years in which his family was in financial need, would have a profound and unprecedented impact on 20th century literature and culture. 100 Years of Ulysses
